mapper.insert: insert into myfile (id, name, url, cdate, fsize, ftype, funid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update myfile set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsize = #{fsize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, funid = #{funid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, url, cdate, fsize, ftype, funid from myfile
